messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Bummed about field day
messages.messageBody:
<<Hmmm, Jennifer....look for me in South Carolina. I'm a loud, cantakerous
Episcopalian! :)>>

LOL Brenda! Hey, we'd get on smashingly then! <bwg> Oh, I can't wait to go
to the conference!! I wish I could drag my enormous family (extended) with
me. I can only imagine them lost in a sea of odd, quirky unschoolers! Doh!
Did I just call you all odd and quirky?? <beg> I guess that was my family
speaking through me!

Jennifer, thanking you all for making me *feel* normal!

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Bummed about field day
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hmmm, Jennifer....look for me in South Carolina.  I m a loud, cantakerous Episcopalian!  :) brenda
messages.messageBody:
5/10/03 01:55:

> They are very quiet and reserved Episcopalians and we are the loud,
> cantankerous, heathen agnostics. <g>

Hmmm, Jennifer....look for me in South Carolina. I'm a loud, cantakerous
Episcopalian! :)

brenda
